detailed_profile.about: Currently in Bengaluru, India, I‚Äôm a Product Designer passionate about yoga, music, and creativity‚Äîa part-time dreamer, full-time designer. I specialize in creating seamless, impactful user experiences that elevate brands and drive growth. With a strong problem-solving approach and a sharp eye for aesthetics, I‚Äôve taken ownership of multiple projects to shape designs that are as functional as they are beautiful. My focus areas include: - Product Innovation: Driving initiatives that improve lives through thoughtful, user-centered design - AI Integrations & Tools: Harnessing AI‚Äôs potential to build intelligent, adaptive experiences - Data-Driven Design Decisions: Using analytics and insights to shape user experiences that resonate. - Figma Plugin Development: Building tools to streamline design and improve workflow efficiency Let‚Äôs connect and explore how we can transform ideas into reality through design!

recommendations: Digvijay Anand ‚ÄúProbably I am not qualified to write a recommendation for a person who's epitome of such diverse experiences and enjoys a high stature among all his peers. In a short span of 5 months that I worked with Anurag, everyday was a learning experience while working with him.The best part I liked was Anurag gives one enough freedom to manage one's work, yet giving the confidence that he's standing behind all decisions. One thing I learned from Anurag was to always keep the customer journey and big picture in mind to ensure we're designing something that is actually adding value to the customer experience. I picked up some more tips and tricks on how to break a complex problem, find the root cause and then work on finding a solution. He's a great asset to any organization and the kind of insights he can provide are invaluable and can be instrumental to an organization's growth. Working with Anurag has been a great learning experience for me. I really wish it could have been a bit more longer and would love to work with him again if possible in future. ‚Äù

Arun Sreelalan Iyer ‚ÄúI had the opportunity to work with Anurag for nearly 1 year, primarily during my role as a Product Manager at Pervacio. Anurag is an excellent manager and mentor. I have worked with several managers in my career, and I highly appreciate Anurag's skills. He puts in a lot of effort in growing people and teams to higher levels of competence, and encourages learning by stretching experiences just outside one's comfort zone. Anurag is meticulous at planning and delivering products, and aligning teams to achieve goals. He has experience scaling companies, and is an excellent asset to a company as a Strategy Officer or Products VP. I look forward to interacting and working with Anurag soon.‚Äù

patents.title: System, method, and apparatus for voice handoffs
patents.description: A power management system is described where the handset can enter sleep or hibernation mode for a particular service, when the particular service is either not used or not available. The handset is capable of using the service, even in response to a non-user initiated incoming request for communication. The handset receives the request over the active service. The handset can then check for the availability of the inactive service, activate it, and a selection can be made between them.

patents.title: Services convergence among heterogeneous wired and wireless networks
patents.description: A system and method for heterogeneous network communication including wired, and wireless communication mediums for seamless data, voice, as well as multimedia applications independent of the actual communication medium, type of device, and protocols running over such communication channels. The system and method described herein allow the communication channels operate in their native mode of operation independent of converged application perception by user of the application, a user being a person, a machine, or any other such entity that can be identified as user.

detailed_profile.position: Putting Data to use to improve Health Outcomes
detailed_profile.about: I thrive on the lookout for something new to explore and eventually build into a successful enterprise. I am a strong believer that innovation doesn‚Äôt need to be brewed in a lab. It comes from the most regular processes. All it needs is thinking out of the box, or rather looking at things from a different perspective. I am passionate about solving real-life problems at scale and I believe that technology is the big enabler in making this a reality, at a much lower cost. My career has been built and modeled on my beliefs and passion and the biggest proof point is my journey with Bajaj Finance Ltd, where I converted a service business into the product offering. I am very proud to have lead the team which created the EMI Card, which is a unique offering globally, making loan experience friction free. Indians have global aspiration but need local solutions. I have successfully re-modeled global sales finance business for India thereby creating the largest NBFC in the last 10 years. But there is still a lot of room for innovation in the financial services space and we are just getting started. So I am taking another pivot in my career and exploring new technology tools in customer interaction to harness the next $B opportunity in servicing billion Indians.

Along with its tremendous impact on human lives, unfortunately it has also succeeded in creating ripples in the corporate world too. Layoffs, shutting down of businesses, work from home led redundancy and increasing rate of unemployment all across the industries is extremely concerning. There is a tremendous increase in the number of colleagues/professionals who need help in their career as they have lost their jobs or internships. A proof of a not so good - New Normal.#SupportSaturdays is the first Global Digital CSR Led Social Campaign founded by an army of 25 plus Founding Ambassadors who are also professionals, entrepreneurs and leaders from various industries. They all have come together for a cause to help other corporate professionals in this time of dire need. Through #Supportsaturdays Campaign they will give strategic collective visibility on Saturdays by sharing profiles of people in need on their respective LinkedIn pages.People in need will tag their CV's/ Video CV"s (Max 1 minute) using the #SupportSaturdays and the magic of sharing and caring will begin on every Saturday.Launch Date - August 15, 2020Join as an Ambassador - Write to us at - sscampaign15@gmail.comDISCLAIMER- Sharing is not equal to recommendation or endorsement of any sorts. experience.description_html:
SupportSaturdays - A Global Digital I-CSR Campaign

VISION of the Campaign
A Professionals Movement BY the Professionals FOR the Professionals
To Build HOPE | To Enhance SKILLS | To Uplift LIVES

MISSION of the Campaign
Launching – “I-CSR” Individual – Corporate Social Responsibility
To be the Largest Digital Human Movement Ever in the Global Corporate World

What is #SupportSaturdays Campaign?
The recent havoc created by the Covid situation around the world is not only unprecedented by daunting to say the least. Along with its tremendous impact on human lives, unfortunately it has also succeeded in creating ripples in the corporate world too. Layoffs, shutting down of businesses, work from home led redundancy and increasing rate of unemployment all across the industries is extremely concerning. There is a tremendous increase in the number of colleagues/professionals who need help in their career as they have lost their jobs or internships. A proof of a not so good - New Normal.

#SupportSaturdays is the first Global Digital CSR Led Social Campaign founded by an army of 25 plus Founding Ambassadors who are also professionals, entrepreneurs and leaders from various industries. They all have come together for a cause to help other corporate professionals in this time of dire need. Through #Supportsaturdays Campaign they will give strategic collective visibility on Saturdays by sharing profiles of people in need on their respective LinkedIn pages.

People in need will tag their CV's/ Video CV"s (Max 1 minute) using the #SupportSaturdays and the magic of sharing and caring will begin on every Saturday.
Launch Date - August 15, 2020
Join as an Ambassador - Write to us at - sscampaign15@gmail.com

DISCLAIMER- Sharing is not equal to recommendation or endorsement of any sorts. Companies are requested to follow their screening protocols while hiring candidates through #SS Campaign.

experience.title: People Manager
experience.description: Acting as a catalyst for employees and organization growth. Because it is important to achieve organizational goals in a way where personal goals are also met. Looking after employees happiness coefficient so that their productivity is increased. Exploring various platforms,from where talent can be hired. Also making sure the salary hits each employees bank account bang on time. Taking care of their leaves and attendance issues, so that they can entirely focus on work. Talking to them on a regular basis as a friend rather than being an HR. Putting procedures and process in place so that standardization helps us, while we are growing. Helping people sail through transition phase successfully. Because no organization has ever achieved anything without its people.

publications.title: Life in Organizations -Paradoxes, Dilemmas and Possibilities
publications.subtitle: Notion Press
publications.description: We live in a world of contradictions. Paradox is a central dimension of the life in organizations. Decision-making in organizations is becoming more and more paradoxical with the increasing amount of uncertainty and stress in the environment, shifting priorities and conflicting objectives. We constantly need to deal with the tensions between the old and the new, the individual and the collective, process focus and flexibility, performance and development, internal and external demands, and, change and stability. Paradoxical thinking enables us to respond creatively to the challenges in organizational life and to find more meaning and fulfillment. This book is an exciting journey through the paradoxes, dilemmas and possibilities in the various aspects of organizational life, including joining the organization, getting things done, building capability, planning careers, rewards and recognition, finding meaning and purpose, creating ownership and the sense of belonging, leadership and followership, and, exiting the organization. It will help the readers to respond effectively to the complex challenges in organizational life by leveraging the principles of paradoxical thinking. This book will be of interest to anyone who works in business organizations. It also provides additional insights for business leaders, people managers, and human resource professionals.

detailed_profile.name: Sidharath Bansal
detailed_profile.position: DevOps Engineer @ Bajaj Finserv Health | Toastmaster | Curious
detailed_profile.about: As a DevOps Engineer with extensive experience in cloud technologies, particularly Microsoft Azure, I am dedicated to enhancing cloud infrastructure and security. My expertise spans Azure Firewall, Web Application Firewall (WAF), and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), where I have a proven track record in implementing comprehensive security solutions, streamlining automation processes, and optimizing disaster recovery protocols. I am adept at designing and deploying resilient firewall architectures, managing complex database environments, and ensuring seamless resource recovery. My hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines, containerization tools like Docker, and orchestration with Kubernetes has consistently driven efficiency and reliability in cloud operations. Through innovative solutions and automation scripts, I have successfully reduced costs and improved system performance. In addition to my cloud-focused skills, I have a strong background in full stack development, with proficiency in Node.js, React, MongoDB, and Express.js. This dual expertise in DevOps and development allows me to effectively bridge the gap between operational and development teams, fostering a collaborative approach to problem-solving and project execution. I am committed to continuous learning and professional growth, regularly publishing articles on Medium about cutting-edge DevOps practices and technological advancements. My goal is to stay at the forefront of industry trends and share valuable insights with the community. I thrive in dynamic, collaborative environments where feedback is encouraged and new challenges are embraced. I am always seeking opportunities to leverage cloud technologies and DevOps best practices to drive business success and contribute to the achievement of organizational goals. Let‚Äôs connect to discuss how we can harness these technologies to innovate and excel.

detailed_profile.name: Soham Dixit
detailed_profile.position: Sr. Engineering Manager @ Bajaj Finserv Health | 30 under 30 - Bajaj Finserv | Ex American Express | Hackathons | Solutioning | Creating the impact :)
detailed_profile.about: Love to crack new challenges and solve real-world problems! Currently, as a Senior Technical Lead at Bajaj Finserv Health, I have been instrumental in spearheading a talented team of developers in architecting, designing, and implementing solutions for Authentication, Sales, and Personalization Modules. My experience at American Express as an Engineer III enabled me to optimize legacy code, resulting in a 50% reduction in application loading latency. Additionally, I led the UI stream of the Model Management Platform, enhancing prospect personalization and contributing to open-source frameworks like OneApp of American Express In my role as a Co-Founder at WorkRe Workspaces Pvt Ltd., I conceptualized, designed, and developed the innovative WorkRe App & Web, transforming the co-working cafe experience. I also served as a Team Leader at the Ministry of Statistics and PI, where I led a government-monitored team to digitize India's CPI Data collection process, reducing latency by 50% and achieving real-time data collection and tracking. Aiming to create the impact and lead things positively! My accomplishments include: 1. Best Engineering Squad at BFHL 2. UNESCO India Int. Hackathon - Mentor 3. Dashing Debutant Award - BFHL 4. Smart India Hackathon - Winner 5. Airbus Hackathon - Winner 6. CTS Project Expo - Winner 7. Amex Annual CTF Challenge - Winner 8. American Express Codestreet - 2nd 9. UST Global D3Code Hackathon - 3rd I love to share whatever I learn and keep my surroundings positive full of energy. Strongly believe in the fact "Together ordinary people can do extraordinary things!" Striving for the betterment of our society has always been my aim!

honors_and_awards.description: D3Code 2019 was 1st edition of hackathon conducted by UST Global. Around 7000 participants competed across India for top 3 positions. This hackathon was unique in a way wherein problem statement was disclosed on the day of hackathon itself. We developed an application for Warehouse Management with real-time tracking as what was expected as per the problem statement.

honors_and_awards.title: American Express Hackathon (Codestreet 2019) 1st Runner Up

Me and my team worked on a project inclining to Payments theme. Our project focused on fastening the existing payment process done via UPI across various cities in India. We developed an application named AMEX ONE for the same.

detailed_profile.name: N Kiran Kumar
detailed_profile.position: Fin.AI | Prompt to Impact | Challenger & Cheer Leader | Ex Co-Founder | Enterprise Architect | <Hands On/>
detailed_profile.about: About Me: I am an accomplished technologist with a passion for innovation and simplicity, bringing a proven track record of driving transformative changes. My journey began at 19, developing retail showroom applications using FoxPro, earning multiple referrals for exceptional work. During the dot-com boom, I joined a leading product-based company, leading global implementations and establishing my expertise. In 2006, I co-founded a venture and introduced **PrintSuite**, a pioneering RPA solution widely adopted by India's major banks. As **Director - Technology**, I excel as an Enterprise Architect, leveraging **Generative AI, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing, and Digital Transformation** to deliver measurable outcomes. Currently, I am focused on **reducing operational costs** with Generative AI through **world-class, proven solutions**. I am passionate about delivering **practical, context-driven solutions**, seeing technology as a powerful enabler for real-world challenges. Value Proposition: üîπ **IT Leadership**: Crafting IT roadmaps that balance innovation, budget, security, and sustainability. üîπ **Architecture Expertise**: Designing future-state architectures that align with business goals. üîπ **Generative AI Solutions**: Driving cost optimization and efficiency with world-class implementations. üîπ **Team Builder**: Developing high-performing teams and mentoring talent. üîπ **Hands-On Execution**: Guiding projects end-to-end with strategic and technical expertise. üîπ **Pre-Sales Excellence**: Delivering tailored, impactful solutions that exceed client expectations. My Approach: As a coach, I embrace a dual mindset of **Challenger and Cheerleader**‚Äîmotivating teams to push boundaries while celebrating successes to build confidence. I thrive on anticipating future trends, empowering teams, and delivering innovations that drive measurable outcomes.

o Ensure compliance of the Standard Operating Procedures with internal and external audit.

detailed_profile.name: Dr. Amarjit S Kapoor
detailed_profile.position: Senior Head - Digital Platforms at Bajaj Finserv
detailed_profile.about: A 'Nonconformist leader' with a positive mindset. I love to dig into Business, Customer and Stakeholder problems. To solve them with a non traditional, modern and technology driven approach; Mostly through E2E business process transformation. I have enjoyed many leadership positions throughout my career in Contact Centre Operations (Sales, Service, Collections and Back office), Process Excellence (COE), Project Management and Strategy. My personal and professional experiences have thought me the following about myself: 1) Successful at creating, scaling and sustaining businesses - Internal & external customers at the center of all that I do - Excel at execution of big ideas with given constraints - My gut instinct is good, but I seek data for my decisions - Passionate about results 2) Seamlessly align, lead and grow world-class teams - I love to win, but helping the team win gives me greater joy - Buck always stops with me 3) I continue to educate, refine and drive myself to be a better person (personally & professionally) - Constantly learning because I never settle - Mostly stay calm when faced with adversity - Focus on making high-quality decisions - Greatly enjoy meeting new people and hearing newer perspectives Reach out if you want to speak about Contact Centre & BFSI industry best practices across People, Process and Technology. We could also discuss sports and politics, to the best of my knowledge and our interests. Stay Safe, Stay Connected!!!!!!!

detailed_profile.name: Sabyasachi Mukerji, CFA
detailed_profile.position: Bajaj Finserv AMC || Buy side Analyst || MBA IIM Ranchi, B.E Jadavpur University
detailed_profile.about: Sabyasachi has over 10 years of experience and is currently working as a Buy side analyst covering Auto, Auto ancs, Retail (including Jewellery & QSR), Specialty Chemicals, Real Estate, Hospital & Diagnostics sector. He started his career in Finance domain as an Equity Research Analyst in a sell side institutional broking house looking after Retail, Hotels, Cap goods and Power T&D sector. He has completed his Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) in Finance specialization from Indian Institute of Management, Ranchi. In this period, he achieved excellence in quite a few subjects including Business Valuation, Fixed Income Securities, Derivatives, Project Finance etc. Apart from academics, he brought plenty of laurels for his institute including Deloitte Maverick Case Study Challenge (Zonal Finalist), Mahindra War Room Season 9 Campus Winners and CFA Research Challenge 2016-17 (National Finalist) to name a few. Prior doing MBA, he worked in Larsen & Toubro, Electrical & Automation in the area of Product Management (Switchgear Products) for 31 months. He is an Electrical Engineering graduate from Jadavpur University, Kolkata.

positions.title: Senior Engineer, Product Management
positions.description_html:
Product Management, Electrical & Automation.
B2B marketing of Electrical Switchgear Products (Moulded Case Circuit Breakers)

• Product Promotion: Developed Marketing collaterals and detailed technical catalogs for increasing market awareness for the products. Organized sales and customer training sessions which helped them make application specific product selection.
• Product Portfolio Management: Coordinated with allied functions of Design, Quality, Engineering Logistics and IT to explore new avenues of product cost reduction.
• Market Survey: Surveyed OEM and Industry segments for getting customer insights for new product development. Developed and launched two new products in the market
• Bench marking: Bench marked competitor products with respect to price and technical benefits. Helped the sales team in pitching our products against competition.
• Pricing: Formulated Pricing Strategy and created the official company price list
• Sale strategies: Collaborated with Sales team to form discount based sales schemes
• Sales Support: Supported sales personnel through release of regular application notes and pricing ready reckoners.

Achievements
• Rated Top performer in FY 12-13
• Created detailed technical catalog called ‘The Blue Book’. The books contains detailed technical specifications which helped our sales, panel builders and consultants
• Successfully developed and launched ProductWhiz, first ever android application to be launched for product selection, on Google Playstore. Currently has a 1000+ install base
• Collaborated with design to create E-Cord, a PC based discrimination and coordination wizard specifically designed for consultants
• Achieved sales target figures for FY 11-12, FY 12-13
• Team member in the organizing team at L&T EAIC for ELECRAMA 2012, 2014

experience.title: Assistant Manager - Legal and Compliance
experience.description: Compliance ProfilePreparation of Key Information Memorandum, Scheme Information Document for launch of new schemes and for existing schemes on an on-going basis.Preparation of Compliance Test Report, Exceptions to Compliance Test Report Coordination with NSDL/CDSL and NSE for listing of close ended Fixed Maturity Plans.Vetting and approving Sales Literatures/Advertisements issued in various forms in accordance with the requirements specified in Advertisement Code under SEBI Regulations.Coordination for obtaining declarations under Code of Conduct of Personal Securities Transactions. Reviews of trading activities like Equity and Debt Deals, Inter Scheme Transactions of Securities in line with the internal guidelines and SEBI stipulated requirements.Coordination for preparation and publication of unaudited financial results of schemes of the Mutual Fund on a half yearly basis within SEBI stipulated time lines.Projects/Assignments undertaken Setting investments limits and restrictions applicable to Mutual Fund investments during the migration of Front Office System from Quantis to MFund and monitoring on real time basis.Working on the launch of e-compliance application for Personal Securities Transactions thereby facilitating online disclosures.Merger/Restructuring of various equity and debt schemes of the Mutual Fund.Secretarial ProfileEnsuring proper arrangement for the Board and General Meetings including preparation and timely despatch of Notice and Agenda. Preparation of Minutes of the Meetings, maintaining/updating Statutory Registers.Preparation and Filing of various Forms as required under the Companies Act, 1956 with the Office of Ministry of Corporate Affairs.Legal ProfilePreparation and coordination for various Premises agreement entered by the AMC to obtain the Premises on lease/license basis and get the same registered and executed as required under Indian Stamp Act/Various states stamp acts.
experience.description_html:
Compliance Profile

Preparation of Key Information Memorandum, Scheme Information Document for launch of new schemes and for existing schemes on an on-going basis.
Preparation of Compliance Test Report, Exceptions to Compliance Test Report
Coordination with NSDL/CDSL and NSE for listing of close ended Fixed Maturity Plans.
Vetting and approving Sales Literatures/Advertisements issued in various forms in accordance with the requirements specified in Advertisement Code under SEBI Regulations.
Coordination for obtaining declarations under Code of Conduct of Personal Securities Transactions.
Reviews of trading activities like Equity and Debt Deals, Inter Scheme Transactions of Securities in line with the internal guidelines and SEBI stipulated requirements.
Coordination for preparation and publication of unaudited financial results of schemes of the Mutual Fund on a half yearly basis within SEBI stipulated time lines.

Projects/Assignments undertaken
Setting investments limits and restrictions applicable to Mutual Fund investments during the migration of Front Office System from Quantis to MFund and monitoring on real time basis.
Working on the launch of e-compliance application for Personal Securities Transactions thereby facilitating online disclosures.
Merger/Restructuring of various equity and debt schemes of the Mutual Fund.

Secretarial Profile

Ensuring proper arrangement for the Board and General Meetings including preparation and timely despatch of Notice and Agenda.
Preparation of Minutes of the Meetings, maintaining/updating Statutory Registers.
Preparation and Filing of various Forms as required under the Companies Act, 1956 with the Office of Ministry of Corporate Affairs.


Legal Profile

Preparation and coordination for various Premises agreement entered by the AMC to obtain the Premises on lease/license basis and get the same registered and executed as required under Indian Stamp Act/Various states stamp acts.

experience.title: Assistant Manager - Secretarial and Compliance
experience.description: Secretarial and Compliance 					        (Nov 2006 - Nov 2007 as Executive and Nov 2007 - Jun 2008 as Assistant Manager)					Compliance ProfilePreparation of Offer Document/Scheme Information Document for various schemes and coordination for printing of final Offer Document.Preparation and filing of Exception Report on Bi-monthly basis, Compliance Test Report and Half yearly reports by Trustees with SEBI.Checking of 5%/2% limit disclosure under SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 1992 and SEBI (Substantial Acquisition of Shares and Takeover) Regulations, 1997, as applicable and coordination for reporting to the Company and designated Stock Exchanges, where required.Coordination with Registrars for filing New Scheme Reports with SEBI and Suspicious Transaction Report with Financial Intelligence Unit - India.Uploading details on SEBI and AMFI portal.

Uploading details on SEBI and AMFI portal.

detailed_profile.position: Reputation Architect | Strategic Communications | Building Trust Through Storytelling
detailed_profile.about: Currently leading corporate communications at Bajaj Finserv Asset Management Ltd, driving strategic brand positioning and reputation management. Skilled in marketing communications, public relations, and leadership communications, the role focuses on building the Bajaj Finserv AMC brand with innovative communication strategies. With over a decade of experience in corporate communications across banking, credit rating, and financial services, expertise spans thought leadership, crisis management, and social media. Previous roles include enhancing brand positioning at South Indian Bank and managing PR and leadership communications at ICRA, contributing to impactful business narratives.

experience.description_html:
1. Develop and implement a comprehensive communications plan to project a positive image for the brand
2. Promote the Company’s visibility in local, national, and international markets by identifying newsworthy stories and pitching these to the appropriate media: print, television, and Online.
3. Identify challenges and emerging issues faced by the organization
4. Monitor coverage of the Company in newspapers, industry publications, blogs, etc. & keep the management apprised of relevant information, and assists in formulating responses as needed.
5. Oversee all the communications going to media including the research reports, marketing collateral materials and electronic communications including Company's website and social media.
6. Actively engage, cultivate and manage press relationships to ensure coverage surrounding Company programs, special events, public announcements, research views and other projects.
7. Oversee the day-to-day activities of the communications function including budgeting, planning, press releases, speaker-ship opportunities and award nominations.
8. Internal Communications operations

detailed_profile.name: Ravinder B.
detailed_profile.position: Program Manager, Digital Platform @ Bajaj Finserv | PMP, Executive Management Program
detailed_profile.about: As the Program Manager at Bajaj Finserv, a leading non-banking financial company in India, I lead complex and innovative projects across multiple business domains and processes, leveraging my PMP certification and Executive General Management Program from IIM Calcutta. With 17 years of experience in project management and digital transformation, I have the skills and knowledge to deliver value-added solutions to the organization and its customers. My core competencies include implementing mobile applications, defining and planning the digital vision and strategy, building digital transformation roadmaps, conceptualizing and translating analytical results into business proposals, and architecting solutions to implement business recommendations. I have successfully managed projects involving cross-functional units across remote locations, such as the migration to a new Business Rule Engine, the launch of a new Risk Infra-technology project, and the creation of capability for Retail EMI card and Ecommerce products. I am passionate about leveraging technology and data to enhance customer experience, optimize business performance, and create value for the organization.

experience.title: Application Developer
experience.description: Role: Team member (Developer)Technical Environment: VB.Net, MS SQL Server 2000, Windows XPTotal Duration: Mid of April 2005 to Oct 2005 (6 months during my Graduation term.)Project Description:This system is used to keep the attendance of the employees. This system generates run time database with the company name containing each company's master tables, such as Employee Master, Shift Master, Department Master, Designation Master and Leave Master. The attendance of the employees is captured by the entry string which is generated when the employee displays his I-Card to the device. This is 20 Digit entry strings which contain the complete details of the employees department, designation, shift and Date Time.This project was made as a part of our syllabus during my Graduation period.Responsibilities:* Gaining knowledge of the application through knowledge transition phase.* Construction of new components* Integration and System Testing.* Peer Reviews of the code.* Involved in bug fixing and enhancement.
experience.description_html:
Role: Team member (Developer)
Technical Environment: VB.Net, MS SQL Server 2000, Windows XP
Total Duration: Mid of April 2005 to Oct 2005 (6 months during my Graduation term.)
Project Description:
This system is used to keep the attendance of the employees. This system generates run time database with the company name containing each company's master tables, such as Employee Master, Shift Master, Department Master, Designation Master and Leave Master. The attendance of the employees is captured by the entry string which is generated when the employee displays his I-Card to the device. This is 20 Digit entry strings which contain the complete details of the employees department, designation, shift and Date Time.
This project was made as a part of our syllabus during my Graduation period.
Responsibilities:
* Gaining knowledge of the application through knowledge transition phase.
* Construction of new components
* Integration and System Testing.
* Peer Reviews of the code.
* Involved in bug fixing and enhancement.

detailed_profile.name: Sayani Mukherjee
detailed_profile.position: Chief Manager @ Bajaj Finserv AMC || Product Manager for Passive Mutual Funds || ETFs & Index Funds || PMO || Digital Product Development
detailed_profile.about: What isn‚Äôt in my resume or in the experience and education section but is probably more relevant I‚Äôm a cerebral person. I live in my head & cultivate my mind fortress to escape the banalities of the world imagining an alternate reality where things can be different ( this may also explain my love for fiction books ). These bursts of creativity have helped me tackle a lot of managerial issues in my career (which was very very non fictional). This is the precise reason I believe in synergies in unrelated fields. I‚Äôm fiercely competitive. To give some sort of measure, Dare2Compete, an online platform that hosts competitions across the most prestigious college campuses in India ( both undergrad and post grad ) has told me I‚Äôm the 10th most competitive college champion across India in the year 2021 . Funnily though, I‚Äôm extremely detached to my wins but can write sob stories about my losses. The losses bring in copious amounts of self doubt which unfortunately an equal measure of win can‚Äôt obliterate. However, my auto setting is to fight. So I try and fight these and it‚Äôs an ongoing battle I fear stagnancy & this very fear drives me to learn more. And while today‚Äôs learning is promoted ( not restricted to ) as a gazillion online courses, I‚Äôd like to advocate the learning of old times ( a board game or a hobby ) which wasn‚Äôt always born out of the desire to fit in but to serve one‚Äôs own interest. While my professional career has always been in client facing roles , conversing & convincing them ( B2B & B2C sales is a bit of a master course in the art of convincing), I‚Äôm a relatively quiet person who enjoys anonymity. I like listening more than talking and being a better listener has enabled me in my sales career. ( no courses there ) I have a 50 year plan:A desired level of bank balance , a requisite amount of fitness and a moderate social life is what an average human being desires to keep themselves happy and I believe in the law of averages when it comes to certain things. To succeed in life we need a wishbone, a backbone and a funny-bone. And life is a work in progress

projects.title: StaySocial
projects.description: StaySocial is a social media application that promotes users to live in the moment and share a part of that moment with their friends and families in form of short stories that they create. Users can login by creating account or through google sign and go about creating, updating or deleting their stories whileliking stories of their friends and families.

projects.title: CovidVisualizer
projects.description: This project focuses on providing covid statistics with visualizations inorder to better understand the rate at which covid is growing.There are two types of visualizations used -Map - shows number of deaths/cases/recovered country-wiseLineGraph - graph showing worldwide new cases,deaths or recovered cases as per user selectionWe also have a stats column which displays live cases by Country

projects.title: Rainery
projects.description: Rainery is a platform that allows users to predict whether it will rain tommorrow or not. It makes use of a machine learning model to process user input data and make prediction on it. Its an easy to use app where user can make predictions just by filling up a form.

projects.title: RoutingService
projects.description: This project is basically google map for my college SIT. The returned results are highly accurate.

positions.title: Senior Data Engineer
positions.description_html:
𝐄𝐧𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐂𝐑𝐌 | Tech Stack: PostgreSQL, ADF, Databricks, Azure Boards, GitHub, CI/CD

• Designed 𝐧𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐝 𝐫𝐞𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐬𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐦𝐚𝐬 using advanced 𝐏𝐨𝐬𝐭𝐠𝐫𝐞𝐒𝐐𝐋 concepts like foreign key constraints, indexing strategies, and partitioning to optimize performance and scalability.
• Developed 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐩𝐭𝐮𝐚𝐥, 𝐥𝐨𝐠𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥, and 𝐩𝐡𝐲𝐬𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥data models for the Engg CRM, ensuring data integrity and referential consistency.
• Engineered robust 𝐮𝐬𝐞𝐫-𝐝𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐝 𝐟𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 (𝐔𝐃𝐅𝐬), 𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐞𝐝 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐜𝐞𝐝𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬, 𝐰𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐨𝐰 𝐟𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬, 𝐂𝐓𝐄𝐬 in PostgreSQL to support complex business logic and reporting needs.
• Implemented data quality checks, triggers, and audit logging mechanisms within PostgreSQL to ensure traceability and compliance.
• Tuned slow-running queries using EXPLAIN plans, indexing, and query refactoring for improved database performance.
• Managed code deployments using GitHub CI/CD pipelines, ensuring reliable releases with rollback and versioning.
• Provided production support by resolving database issues, optimizing queries, and managing schema changes in a live environment.
• Collaborated cross-functionally with API and frontend teams to enable seamless PostgreSQL data consumption through REST endpoints.

Worked on comprehensive KYC (Know Your Customer) project utilizing PostgreSQL. Implemented various KYC methods including CKYC, DigiLocker KYC, eKYC-OTP, Biometric eKYC, and FaceID eKYC. The project involved creating and managing functions, stored procedures, triggers, and views in PostgreSQL. Conducted extensive testing of developed enhancements using Postman. Enhanced the QC portal for EMI Card quality control and automated the logic for auto QC completion. The project involved creating and managing functions, stored procedures, triggers, and views in PostgreSQL.

publications.title: The Ultimate Guide to Mastering SQL Concepts
publications.subtitle: Medium
publications.description: Introduction to SQL: SQL (Structured Query Language) is the standard language for interacting with relational databases. It allows for storing, retrieving, and manipulating data. Key components include databases, schemas, tables, SQL queries, views, functions, stored procedures, and transactions. SQL commands are categorized into Data Definition Language (DDL), Data Query Language (DQL), Data Manipulation Language (DML), Data Control Language (DCL), and Transaction Control Language (TCL). Each category serves specific functions, from defining database structures to managing data access and transactions.

projects.title: A prototype of relay based single phase stabilizer for domestic sag and swell regulations with over/undervoltage and overcurrent cutoff.
projects.description: Relay has given controls from microcontroller which is reliable technology used in todays era. Also, this voltage stabilizer is economically viable which fulfils the requirements of domestic protection of equipment. In this project all the specifications and standards of component design of briefly explained. This project provides a comprehensive study of performance of microcontroller and relative switching of relay circuits. Various topologies of power quality are briefly given.

projects.title: Traffic Signs Recognition
projects.description: Developed a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model for traffic sign classification, achieving high accuracy in categorizing different types of traffic signs. Utilized knowledge of Keras, Matplotlib, Scikit learn, Pandas, PIL and image classification to build the model in four steps: exploring the dataset, building the CNN architecture, training the model, and testing the model. This project demonstrates expertise in deep learning, computer vision, and image classification.

detailed_profile.name: Supraja Battula
detailed_profile.position: Lead - Tech and Business Process Re-engineering | GYLP - Bajaj Finserv
detailed_profile.about: As a Group Young Leader Program Associate at Bajaj Finserv, I am part of a rotational leadership development program that exposes me to diverse functions and domains within the financial services industry. I work with senior leaders and mentors to deliver strategic projects and initiatives that drive business growth and innovation. Before joining Bajaj Finserv, I completed a summer internship at Pidilite Industries, where I applied my skills to design a pilot for new and innovative products analysing the types of outlets, customers and effective action plans to reach them. I also have 33 months of experience as an engineer at Orient Cement, where I led a team for effective plant electrical maintenance and strategies to optimise the consumption of overall plant. I pursued a Master of Business Administration degree at Symbiosis Institute of Business Management, Pune, with a focus on Marketing and sales. I was an active member of the various clubs and societies, where I coordinate and participate in various academic and cultural events and competitions. detailed_profile.name: Shubham Gupta
detailed_profile.position: Pocket FM | Bajaj Finserv | IIM Bangalore | IIT Delhi
detailed_profile.about: As part of my first job post-MBA with the Bajaj Finserv Group, I worked under 4 different companies in wide-ranging roles like Product Mgmt., Operations, Corporate Sales in 4.5yrs. Had most fun in digital lending trying to understand the 'India 2' customer (the aspiring class) to be able to facilitate credit to this segment via the fastest, most efficient lending processes. Currently working with Pocket FM to identify the best stories & build the best drama audio shows for the US audience. Interested in how AI can be used to lift all boats of the society. Practicing machine learning engineering during free time to make NLP work for India. Always up for a tennis game!

detailed_profile.about: ÔÉò Multiple roles in Risk Management involving credit policy & line strategy, portfolio management and collections spanning different lines of business, products and geographies over the last 19 years have enabled me to get a holistic perspective of the card life cycle. ÔÉò Managed risk effectively through multiple credit downturns across consumer and commercial lines of business. ÔÉò Proficient in enabling fast paced & profitable growth via new channels and programs, driving data innovation, mitigating loss and driving risk governance, collaborating with business & cross functional teams across geographies and developing high performance teams. ÔÉò Top performer in AMEX, received Chairman‚Äôs Award. Received several innovation awards in GE. Certified Six Sigma Green Belt. Functioned as Ombudsperson for GE India. ÔÉò Skill Sets: Risk Strategy, Data Innovation, Consumer/ Commercial/ Merchant Risk Management

experience.title: Director & Chief Credit Officer
experience.description: ÔÉò	Led risk management policy and strategy development for Large Corporates and SMEs straddling both corporate cards and small business cards with 130K customers, $1B AR, $12 B spend and $24 MM loss provisions.   ÔÉò	Delivered portfolio best in class loss rates during a pandemic impacted economy taking swift risk measures for vulnerable segments & launching financial relief programs. ÔÉò	As economy recovered, led risk emergence measures unlocking COVID risk controls, launching a new business loan product and continuing with the right balance of risk measures. ÔÉò	Leveraged external data sources (D&B and Bureaus) to optimize customer cross sell, new account strategy, customer management and model optimization.
experience.description_html:
 Led risk management policy and strategy development for Large Corporates and SMEs straddling both corporate cards and small business cards with 130K customers, $1B AR, $12 B spend and $24 MM loss provisions.
 Delivered portfolio best in class loss rates during a pandemic impacted economy taking swift risk measures for vulnerable segments & launching financial relief programs.
 As economy recovered, led risk emergence measures unlocking COVID risk controls, launching a new business loan product and continuing with the right balance of risk measures.
 Leveraged external data sources (D&B and Bureaus) to optimize customer cross sell, new account strategy, customer management and model optimization.

publications.title: Enhancing Sensitivity Control and Improved Gesture Recognition in Unconstrained Environments using Transfer Learning
publications.subtitle: International Conference on Advances and Applications of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
publications.description: This research presents an innovative approach to human-computer interaction through a transfer learning paradigm, leveraging YOLO for object detection. The study meticulously fine-tunes the model on a dataset leveraging transfer learning, emphasizing the intricacies of sensitivity control for accurate hand gesture recognition. The developed AI Hand Gesture mouse system showcases advancements, particularly excelling in unconstrained environments, signifying our contribution to the field of computer vision and human-computer interaction.
